    align(int gridSizeX, int gridSizeZ)
    Useful when you know a schematic is bigger than your grid
    Recalculates the doors' indexes and position in the grid

    Call this if you made changes real-time to the grid's size
    or you want to use it for a different sized grid

    • align

      public void align(int gridSizeX, int gridSizeZ)
      Useful when you know a schematic is bigger than your grid
      Recalculates the doors' indexes and position in the grid

      Call this if you made changes real-time to the grid's size
      or you want to use it for a different sized grid
      Parameters:
      gridSizeX -
      gridSizeZ -
